comments.body: Just visited the website, but I haven't signed up yet. I read the terms of service, but there is no talk about KYC or AML policy. Does this mean that KYC verification won't ever be requested from any player using your casino?Please consider purchasing copper membership so that you can make a much better Announcement.

If you have your own designer then ask them to design you an ann however if you don't then feel free to contact me, I can help you in ANN design and bitcointalk marketing.PS: It's not only me but there are many professionals we have in bitcointalk who can help you in any service you need.
